text:
Come and visit the wonderful hermitage
of San Venanzio in #Raiano, #Abruzzo with us. The Scala Santa was a huge hit and I did a spot of #healing too! Full vid: https://t.co/rFKIfNUUIw #hermitage #lithotherapy #scalasanta #Italian #hermit #Saints #visitabruzzo #holiday #familyfun https://t.co/QsEQEQR2Aj
